languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт касается камня душ — тот отвечает нежным жемчужным сиянием.{/n} "Они похожи... внешне. Но реликвии мон-кай ярки снаружи и пусты внутри. В них нет ни памяти, ни жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт касается камня душ — тот отвечает нежным жемчужным сиянием.{/n} "Они похожи... внешне. Но реликвии мон-кай ярки снаружи и пусты внутри. В них нет ни памяти, ни жизни".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт касается камня душ — тот отвечает нежным жемчужным сиянием.{/n} "Они похожи... внешне. Но реликвии мон-кай ярки снаружи и пусты внутри. В них нет ни памяти, ни жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with soft pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

{n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

{n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet toca su joya espiritual, que resuena con un brillo suave y nacarado.{/n} «Pueden parecer similares, pero, por más que refulja la superficie de las reliquias mon-keigh, por dentro están vacías. No contienen recuerdos ni vida».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet toca su joya espiritual, que resuena con un brillo suave y nacarado.{/n} «Pueden parecer similares, pero, por más que refulja la superficie de las reliquias mon-keigh, por dentro están vacías. No contienen recuerdos ni vida».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットが魂縛石に触れると、真珠のような柔らかな光を放った。{/n}「これらは似ているように見えるかもしれない。でも、モン＝ケイの遺物が表面的に明るく輝いていても、その中身は空っぽだ。記憶も、命も宿っていない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットが魂縛石に触れると、真珠のような柔らかな光を放った。{/n}「これらは似ているように見えるかもしれない。でも、モン＝ケイの遺物が表面的に明るく輝いていても、その中身は空っぽだ。記憶も、命も宿っていない」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特触碰着她的灵魂石，灵魂石发出了珍珠般的柔光。{/n}“尽管这些猴子的造物看起来光鲜亮丽，与我们的造物非常相似，但内部却空空如也。它们没有记忆，也没有生命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特触碰着她的灵魂石，灵魂石发出了珍珠般的柔光。{/n}“尽管这些猴子的造物看起来光鲜亮丽，与我们的造物非常相似，但内部却空空如也。它们没有记忆，也没有生命。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet berührt ihren Seelenstein, von dem ein sanftes Leuchten ausgeht.{/n} "Sie mögen sich ähnlich sehen. Aber so hell die Relikte der Chem-Pan-Sey an der Oberfläche auch erstrahlen mögen, so hohl sind sie in ihrem Inneren. Sie bergen keine Erinnerungen, kein Leben."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet berührt ihren Seelenstein, von dem ein sanftes Leuchten ausgeht.{/n} "Sie mögen sich ähnlich sehen. Aber so hell die Relikte der Chem-Pan-Sey an der Oberfläche auch erstrahlen mögen, so hohl sind sie in ihrem Inneren. Sie bergen keine Erinnerungen, kein Leben."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet touche sa pierre-esprit, qui se pare en retour d'une douce lueur nacrée.{/n} « S'il est vrai qu'elles se ressemblent, aussi étincelantes soient les reliques mon-keigh en surface, elles n'en demeurent pas moins creuses. Désespérément vides de la plus infime trace de vie et de la moindre bribe de souvenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet touche sa pierre-esprit, qui se pare en retour d'une douce lueur nacrée.{/n} « S'il est vrai qu'elles se ressemblent, aussi étincelantes soient les reliques mon-keigh en surface, elles n'en demeurent pas moins creuses. Désespérément vides de la plus infime trace de vie et de la moindre bribe de souvenir. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in dokunmasıyla birlikte ruh taşı hafif, incimsi bir parıltıyla ışıldıyor.{/n} "Görünümleri benzer olabilir. Ancak mon-keigh yadigârları, dışarıdan her ne kadar parıltılı görünseler de içlerinde boşluk yatar. Hiçbir hatırayı, hiçbir hayatı barındırmazlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet touches her spirit stone, and it resonates with a soft, pearly glow.{/n} "They may appear similar. And yet, as bright as mon-keigh relics are on the surface, they are hollow inside. They hold no memory, no life."
